[vc_row el_id=”qodef-main-rev-slider-holder” anchor=”Home”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_hidden-md vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”85″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”Home”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1″][rev_slider_vc alias=”hello” enable_paspartu=”no”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”Home”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”30″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”speakers” css=”.vc_custom_1604661372269{padding-left: 350px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”50″]

WHAT IS HELLO DECENTRALIZATION?

[vc_empty_space height=”10″]

Hello Decentralization is a free online event and a meeting point for the community to talk and discuss decentralized technologies from a technical perspective. If we think about it, most of the events out there are Ethereum centric or focused on just one blockchain. We aim to give a place and a voice to all the different decentralized technologies, protocols, and projects that are working around the concept of decentralization

[vc_empty_space height=”20″]

A TECH COMMUNITY MEETING POINT

[vc_empty_space height=”10″]

To start and create meaningful conversations, we have stepped out of your typical online conference. Hello Decentralization will focus on the technical aspects of the technology in different ways, such as technical talks, AMA's, coding workshops, and meetups. No matter what's your level in the field, you will find content that adjusts to your knowledge and allows you to keep growing.

[vc_empty_space height=”6″]

Come and join us if you are interested to learn more about decentralization, get to know people in the community, share with the audience, start a conversation, and of course, grow the new internet together.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_single_image image=”7479″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”speakers” css=”.vc_custom_1604749409684{padding-right: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_hidden-lg vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_hidden-md vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-offset-1″][vc_empty_space height=”5″]

WHAT IS HELLO DECENTRALIZATION?

Hello Decentralization is a free online event and a meeting point for the community to talk and discuss decentralized technologies from a technical perspective. If we think about it, most of the events out there are Ethereum centric or focused on just one blockchain. We aim to give a place and a voice to all the different decentralized technologies, protocols, and projects that are working around the concept of decentralization

A TECH COMMUNITY MEETING POINT

To start and create meaningful conversations, we have stepped out of your typical online conference. Hello Decentralization will focus on the technical aspects of the technology in different ways, such as technical talks, AMA's, coding workshops, and meetups. No matter what's your level in the field, you will find content that adjusts to your knowledge and allows you to keep growing.

Come and join us if you are interested to learn more about decentralization, get to know people in the community, share with the audience, start a conversation, and of course, grow the new internet together.
